Text.Page: We can't let the argons keep reinforcing this fortress. They bring more fighters through the zolnaj transporters all the time.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"That's bad."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Precisely. I want you to destroy several of those transporters, and then get back here. We'll decide what to do after that.

Fine work, and thanks for the souvenirs of a successful mission. We need more of those.

The Shariar appreciate your courage. It almost makes up for our depleted forces.
As long as those transporters function, the argons remain powerful.
